a1: Sweden had one of the best defenses in the 2018 World Cup.
q2: Has Sweden ever won the World Cup?
a2: No, they haven't. They came in 7th in 2018.
q3: Do you think they are progressing or regressing as a football nation?
a3: Depends on how we play this year. But personally I feel Sweden is progressing as a football nation.
q4: Sweden needs to take more pride in their team. They seem to passive.
a4: I think Sweden is a pretty even country in terms of emotions.
q5: how many goals per game does sweden score on average
a5: they made 2goals per game in average
